changeSet.author: hemantk
changeSet.sql: update os_specimen_qty_units set unit='ml' where specimen_class='Cell';

changeSet.author: asamgir
changeSet.sql: insert into os_specimen_qty_units (specimen_class, specimen_type, unit, html_display_code, activity_status) values ("Tissue", "Departmental FFPE Block", "count", NULL, "Active"), ("Tissue", "EBUS", "count", NULL, "Active"), ("Tissue", "Ethanol Fixed Paraffin H&E Slide", "count", NULL, "Active"), ("Tissue", "Ethanol Fixed Paraffin Slide", "count", NULL, "Active"), ("Tissue", "ETOH-Fixed Paraffin Block", "count", NULL, "Active"), ("Tissue", "FFPE Block", "count", NULL, "Active"), ("Tissue", "FFPE H&E Slide", "count", NULL, "Active"), ("Tissue", "FFPE Slide", "count", NULL, "Active"), ("Tissue", "Fresh Tissue", "count", NULL, "Active"), ("Tissue", "Microdissected", "count", NULL, "Active"), ("Tissue", "Not Specified", "count", NULL, "Active"), ("Tissue", "OCT Block", "count", NULL, "Active"), ("Tissue", "OCT Slide", "count", NULL, "Active"), ("Tissue", "Snap Frozen", "count", NULL, "Active"), ("Tissue", "Tissue Micro Array", "count", NULL, "Active"), ("Tissue", "FFPE Core", "count", NULL, "Active");

changeSet.author: asamgir
changeSet.sql: delete from catissue_permissible_value where public_id in ('Race_PID', 'Ethnicity_PID', 'Tissue_Site_PID', '2003988', '2003989', '2003993', '2003997', '2004001');

changeSet.author: asamgir
changeSet.id: removing existing specimen types for Molecular specimen class
changeSet.sql: delete from catissue_permissible_value where parent_identifier = (select getPvParentId('2003991', 'Molecular') from dual);

changeSet.author: asamgir
changeSet.id: removing existing specimen types for Cell specimen class
changeSet.sql: delete from catissue_permissible_value where parent_identifier = (select getPvParentId('2003991', 'Cell') from dual);

changeSet.author: asamgir
changeSet.id: removing existing specimen types for Tissue specimen class
changeSet.sql: delete from catissue_permissible_value where parent_identifier = (select getPvParentId('2003991', 'Tissue') from dual);

changeSet.author: asamgir
changeSet.id: removing existing specimen types for Fluid specimen class
changeSet.sql: delete from catissue_permissible_value where parent_identifier = (select getPvParentId('2003991', 'Fluid') from dual);
